column4: good morning. Is this the right place to ask about the gnome 3.x launcher? =D
Can I have 2 columns in that launcher, instead of 1? These buttons are to damn small. =]
=] grat, melvincv. I tried to install the dock extension, but it'd configuration isn't showing up in my dconf editor. I'm using gnome 3.6 (and ubuntu 12.10)
